results.description: The Mali Football Federation confirms that Mohamed Magassouba will stay on as coach of the country's national team after two years as interim boss.
results.shortTitle: Mali finally appoint Magassouba on permanent deal
results.title: Mohamed Magassouba lands Mali role on permanent basis

results.description: Middlesborough striker Rudy Gestede is back in the Benin squad after a three-year absence.
results.shortTitle: Striker Gestede back in Benin squad
results.title: Benin: Striker Rudy Gestede back in squad after three-year absence

results.description: Senegal reach the Africa Cup of Nations semi-finals after a goal by Everton midfielder Idrissa Gueye ends Benin's tournament.
results.shortTitle: Everton's Gueye puts Senegal into semis
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Idrissa Gueye's goal sees Senegal beat Benin to reach semis

thumbnail.altText: Senegal's players celebrate scoring against Benin

results.description: Benin produce a major surprise to knock Morocco out of the Africa Cup of Nations and book a quarter-final spot for the first time.
results.shortTitle: Benin shock Morocco to reach last eight
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Morocco 1-1 Benin (Benin win 4-1 on pens)

thumbnail.altText: Benin's players celebrate scoring against Morocco at the Africa Cup of Nations

results.description: Liverpool forward Sadio Mane says it is his "absolute dream" to help Senegal win the Africa Cup of Nations for the first time.
results.shortTitle: Mane dreams of Afcon glory with Senegal
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Senegal forward Sadio Mane hopes to continue scoring run

results.description: Defending champions Cameroon and Benin play out a goalless draw, allowing both sides to progress into the last 16 of the Africa Cup of Nations.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Cameroon and Benin through after goalless draw

results.description: Benin keep their chances of qualifying for the Africa Cup of Nations last 16 alive with a goalless draw against Guinea-Bissau.
results.shortTitle: Benin held by Guinea-Bissau at Afcon
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Benin keep last-16 chances alive with draw against Guinea-Bissau

results.description: Andre and Jordan Ayew both score as 10-man Ghana are forced to settle for a draw against Benin at the Africa Cup of Nations.
results.shortTitle: Ayew brothers on target in Ghana draw
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Ayew brothers on target as Ghana draw with Benin

results.description: Huddersfield Town's Steve Mounie scores a hat-trick as Benin complete their Africa Cup of Nations preparations with a 3-1 win over fellow finalists Mauritania.
results.shortTitle: Benin's Mounie hits hat-trick in warm-up match
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Benin's Mounie hits hat-trick in warm-up match

results.description: Stephane Sessegnon is in Benin's squad for the Africa Cup of Nations despite being suspended for their opening game in Egypt.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Sessegnon named in Benin squad

thumbnail.altText: Benin's Stephane Sessegnon in action for Montpellier
